title: Execution and levies prohibited
context: ยง560:3-812 Execution and levies prohibited. No execution may issue upon nor may any levy be made against any property of the estate under any judgment against a decedent or a personal representative, but this section shall not be construed to prevent the enforcement of mortgages, pledges or liens upon real or personal property in an appropriate proceeding. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1]
